Transpower issues grid emergency notice, nearly 100,000 lose power after high voltage issue in Northland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/hundreds-lose-power-after-high-Voltage-issue-in-northland/FOYTZ6VKKFCY7HUPCMCK7QGG5A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/hundreds-lose-power-after-high-Voltage-issue-in-northland/FOYTZ6VKKFCY7HUPCMCK7QGG5A/ Avneesh Vincent, Denise Piper, Jenny Ling, Brodie Stone'There will obviously be an investigation into the incident and what caused it.' Thu, 20 Jun 2024 05:38:35 +0000 A downed power pylon near Warkworth has cut power to the Northland region.
Missing Marokopa man Tom Phillips: Police reward offer for information ends in one week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-man-tom-phillips-police-reward-offer-for-information-ends-in-one-week/FBN6KLVTYBCCTPXWUAMB3H7LOQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-man-tom-phillips-police-reward-offer-for-information-ends-in-one-week/FBN6KLVTYBCCTPXWUAMB3H7LOQ/ Raphael FranksSearch for the dad and his three kids, missing for 30 months, has ramped up recently. Thu, 20 Jun 2024 05:33:53 +0000 Tom Phillips and his three children Jayda, Maverick and Ember were reported missing from Marokopa by family on 18 January 2022. Yesterday evening (02 August 2023) Police received reports of sightings of Tom in a brown/bronze 2003 Toyota Hilux flat-deck ute (pictured) on State Highway 31 in the Kawhia area. The children were not with him. We are urging anyone who may have any information, no matter how small, to please come forward to Police. If it is happening now, call 111 and quote file number 211218/5611. Picture supplied by Police
East Auckland park incident: Police seek dashcam footage following reported abduction involving young girl https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/east-auckland-park-incident-police-seek-dashcam-footage-following-reported-abduction-involving-young-girl/BB7HCLQDX5EBNPBJXBFEVLMZG4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/east-auckland-park-incident-police-seek-dashcam-footage-following-reported-abduction-involving-young-girl/BB7HCLQDX5EBNPBJXBFEVLMZG4/ The young girl was transported to the Kidz First Children's Hospital in at Middlemore. Thu, 20 Jun 2024 05:24:09 +0000 Police are making “a number of inquiries” after a young girl was reportedly abducted in East Auckland earlier this month.

Seasonal worker Steven Garae sentenced to seven years’ jail for raping Blenheim school girl, 11 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/seasonal-worker-steven-garae-sentenced-to-7-years-in-prison-for-raping-blenheim-school-girl/YH4ANWEPEZGQDFNF7CFPD2KRAQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/seasonal-worker-steven-garae-sentenced-to-7-years-in-prison-for-raping-blenheim-school-girl/YH4ANWEPEZGQDFNF7CFPD2KRAQ/ Tracy NealCrown prosecutor Jackson Webber said it was 'an appalling rape of a vulnerable girl'. Thu, 20 Jun 2024 04:54:37 +0000 Steven Garae has been sentenced to prison for raping an 11-year-old in the toilet block of the Blenheim Railway Station. The judge declined applications by the media to photograph Garae, for his safety in prison. Photo / Top South Media
Crash near Te Awamutu: Person trapped after car crashes into ditch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/crash-near-te-awamutu-person-trapped-after-car-crashes-into-ditch/VCCGOMGVPNGZDCGDRK6XMSR7YY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/crash-near-te-awamutu-person-trapped-after-car-crashes-into-ditch/VCCGOMGVPNGZDCGDRK6XMSR7YY/ Maryana GarciaThe person was rescued by emergency services.
